document_data.name: ''Benorg's Truth''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Benorg's Truth''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[battleaxe]] laboriously forged by one of the many [[dwarven]] inhabitants of [[Dorn's Deep]].
document_data.Description: This axe was a magnificent work of craftsmanship, evident to any that looked upon it. Tiny [[Dethek|dwarven runes]] of power were etched along its surface, from which a soft blue glow emanated.
document_data.Powers: This weapon was a +''3 battleaxe''. In addition, anyone who wielded it was imbued with a greater sense of defense and there was a small chance that anyone who fought against it would be temporarily stunned.
document_data.History: ''Benorg's Truth'' was last known to be in the possession of the dwarven hero [[Jamoth Stonetree]] and buried alongside him in the crypts of Dorn's Deep.
